content.html: Is Event needed besides MouseEvent and KeyEvent?

content.raw: The private header probably shouldn't include the public one, right?
content.html: The private header probably shouldn't include the public one, right?

content.raw: Yeah.. There are many ways to get the scene and the camera, including global functions like [gui::get_active_camera](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/b936e9b51491f36ea721d3396d15286a33b16ccc/gazebo/gui/GuiIface.cc?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#GuiIface.cc-358).
content.html: Yeah.. There are many ways to get the scene and the camera, including global functions like gui::get_active_camera.

content.raw: Maybe we just get the scene from the camera directly.
content.html: Maybe we just get the scene from the camera directly.

content.raw: Interesting that deprecating these didn't generate any warnings. I guess we have other ways of getting these internally.
content.html: Interesting that deprecating these didn't generate any warnings. I guess we have other ways of getting these internally.
